page.title: 17Communications Around Gunton
page.content: A small post sub Post Office part of a privately owned and picturesque dwelling,but originally belonging to the Gunton Estate serves the village of Hansworth,Gunton and Alby. It stands at a major junction on the main Cromer to Norwich road (A.140) but is surprisingly far from the communities it serves,the nearest group of houses being almost a mile distant. There is a nearby telephone kiosk maintained by Tele-Communications,as is the Automatic Telephone Exchange behind the Post Office. Mail is delivered to the Hansworh Area by postal van from North Walsham and is collected from the Post Office daily.The P.O.at Thorpe.Market which serve.The Tops Hill area is part of the Genaral Stores in the Village Centre.It is well-used,especially by the older inhabitants.
